Changelog:
THE ANIMATION OVERHAUL UPDATE:
A complete overhaul of the animation system has been worked on. Facial animations/controls, montage sections, sounds, and props are now supported.

NEW FEATURES:

- Facial Controls/Animations
- Cell Shaded Character Support
- Targa (.tga) Image Export Support
- Manual Tasty Rigger (Blender Viewport Sidebar)
- Pets Tab
